comment: Who is better? White has a passed and protected pawn. Black has more space available. White's milky is blocked and the Bishop in b2 is completely blind, while his antagonist sees his milky way clear and shining. If Black succeedes in bringing his Knight to d5 and then, at the right moment to e3, the space available for White will be even more reduced and it will be necessary an oxygen bottle to let hime breathe. That is the reason of the move in the text: to force to White Bishop to go to d5 ... so that damned Knight, which is now in e8, cannot go there. 22...
